desc: Free DNA Kits for Paternity testing, Sibling testing, Grandparent testing and Maternity testing. DNA Clinics is accredited to ISO 27001, 17025, 9001 standards and the laboratory is UKAS and Ministry of Justice accredited. Testing kits are completely free - payment is only due when you return your kit.

layout.text: Mother, Child & Father only £99 (Free Kit & Delivery)
